short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check DOI/PMID on webpages for https://redactek.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plug-in will notify RedacTek users of any DOI or PMID identifiers on the current page that correspond with articles that have been identified as potentially having issues via RedacTek's source validation services.
